#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
int IsPrime(int number) {
    if(number<=1)
        return 0;
    int i;
    for (i=2; i*i<=number; i++) {
        if (number % i == 0) return 0;
    }
    return 1;
}
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,j,x,y,z;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        x=0;
        y=0;
        z=0;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>j;
            x+=j;
            cin>>j;
            y+=j;
            cin>>j;
            z+=j;
        }
        if((IsPrime(x))&&(IsPrime(y))&&(IsPrime(z)))
            cout<<"YES\n";
 
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
